blinded-gunners.author: Fantasy Flight Games
blinded-gunners.name: Blinded Gunners
blinded-gunners.ability: While attacking, you cannot spend :accuracy: icons.

capacitor-failure.author: Fantasy Flight Games
capacitor-failure.name: Capacitor Failure
capacitor-failure.ability: If a hull zone has no remaining shields, you cannot recover shields in it nor move shields to it. If that hull zone is defending, you cannot spend :redirect: tokens.

comm-noise.author: Fantasy Flight Games
comm-noise.name: Comm Noise
comm-noise.ability: Your opponent may either reduce your speed by 1 or choose a new command on your top command dial. Then flip this card facedown.

compartment-fire.author: Fantasy Flight Games
compartment-fire.name: Compartment Fire
compartment-fire.ability: You cannot ready your defense tokens.

coolant-discharge.author: Fantasy Flight Games
coolant-discharge.name: Coolant Discharge
coolant-discharge.ability: Only one attack you perform each round can target a ship.

crew-panic.author: Fantasy Flight Games
crew-panic.name: Crew Panic
crew-panic.ability: Before you reveal a command dial, you must either suffer 1 damage or discard that dial. If you discard it, do not reveal a dial this round.

damaged-controls.author: Fantasy Flight Games
damaged-controls.name: Damaged Controls
damaged-controls.ability: When you overlap a ship or obstacle, deal 1 facedown damage card to your ship (in addition to all other obstacle effects).

damaged-munitions.author: Fantasy Flight Games
damaged-munitions.name: Damaged Munitions
damaged-munitions.ability: While attacking a ship, before you roll your attack pool, remove 1 die of your choice.

depowered-armament.author: Fantasy Flight Games
depowered-armament.name: Depowered Armament
depowered-armament.ability: You cannot attack at long range.

disengaged-fire-control.author: Fantasy Flight Games
disengaged-fire-control.name: Disengaged Fire Control
disengaged-fire-control.ability: When declaring the target of an attack, you cannot choose a target against whom the attack would be obstructed.

faulty-countermeasures.author: Fantasy Flight Games
faulty-countermeasures.name: Faulty Countermeasures
faulty-countermeasures.ability: You cannot spend exhausted defense tokens.

injured-crew.author: Fantasy Flight Games
injured-crew.name: Injured Crew
injured-crew.ability: Choose and discard 1 of your defense tokens. Then flip this card facedown.

life-support-failure.author: Fantasy Flight Games
life-support-failure.name: Life Support Failure
life-support-failure.ability:
Discard all of your command tokens.

You cannot have any command tokens.

point-defense-failure.author: Fantasy Flight Games
point-defense-failure.name: Point Defense Failure
point-defense-failure.ability: While attacking a squadron, before you roll your attack pool, remove 1 die of your choice.

power-failure.author: Fantasy Flight Games
power-failure.name: Power Failure
power-failure.ability: Your engineering value is reduced to half its value, rounded down.

projector-misaligned.author: Fantasy Flight Games
projector-misaligned.name: Projector Misaligned
projector-misaligned.ability: Your hull zone with the most remaining shields loses all of its shields. If multiple hull zones are tied for the most, choose between the tied hull zones. Then flip this card facedown.

ruptured-engine.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ruptured-engine.name: Ruptured Engine
ruptured-engine.ability: After you execute a maneuver, if the speed on your speed dial is greater than 1, suffer 1 damage.

shield-failure.author: Fantasy Flight Games
shield-failure.name: Shield Failure
shield-failure.ability: Your opponent may choose up to 2 of your hull zones. Each of the chosen hull zones loses 1 shield. Then flip this card facedown.

structural-damage.author: Fantasy Flight Games
structural-damage.name: Structural Damage
structural-damage.ability: Deal 1 facedown damage card to your ship. Then flip this card facedown.

targeter-disruption.author: Fantasy Flight Games
targeter-disruption.name: Targeter Disruption
targeter-disruption.ability: While attacking, you cannot resolve critical effects.

thrust-control-malfunction.author: Fantasy Flight Games
thrust-control-malfunction.name: Thrust Control Malfunction
thrust-control-malfunction.ability: The yaw value for the last adjustable join at your current speed is reduced by 1.

thruster-fissure.author: Fantasy Flight Games
thruster-fissure.name: Thruster Fissure
thruster-fissure.ability: When you change your speed by 1 or more, suffer 1 damage.
